name: San Francisco County Jail
description: The San Francisco County Jail is comprised of 3 different housing and administrative units plus a ward in the San Francisco General Hospital that provide various programs for inmates. Visitation hours are different for each facility. However, you can call the main phone line for more information. See below for more details on each facility.
